protein.specific_function: Can transform NIH 3T3 cells. Exhibits strong mitogenic and angiogenic properties

reference.reference_text: Coulier F, Batoz M, Marics I, de Lapeyriere O, Birnbaum D: Putative structure of the FGF6 gene product and role of the signal peptide. Oncogene. 1991 Aug;6(8):1437-44.
